House_Kenning_of_Harlaw.name: House Kenning of Harlaw
coat of arms: The storm god's cloudly hand, pale grey, yellow lightning flashing from the fingertips, on black
(Sable, the storm god’s hand nebuly cendr e, issuant from its fingertips lightning bolts or)

House_Merlyn.name: House Merlyn
coat of arms: Twining waterspouts, green on white
(Argent, waterspouts intertwining vert)
House_Merlyn.title: Lord of Pebbleton[1][2]

House_Myre.name: House Myre
coat of arms: 10 nooses, 4-3-2-1, black on white with a border of blood
(Argent, ten nooses 4-3-2-1 sable within a bordure sanguine)

House_Orkwood.name: House Orkwood
coat of arms: Dark green pines strewn closely together on yellow
(Or sem  of pines vert)

House_Sparr.name: House Sparr
coat of arms: Oak saltire on blue
(Azure, a saltire brunâtre)

House_Stonehouse.name: House Stonehouse
coat of arms: A black brazier on a grey masonry field
(Cendr e masoned proper, a brazier sable)

House_Stonetree.name: House Stonetree
coat of arms: A bare stone tree, grey on black
(Sable, a stone tree blasted cendr e)

House_Sunderly.name: House Sunderly
coat of arms: A drowned man, pink and pale, floating upright in a blue-green sea, his hair streaming upwards, as fish nibble at his limbs
(Aquamarine, a drowned man erect carnation, hair to chief, fishes proper nibbling at his limbs)

House_Tawney.name: House Tawney
coat of arms: A scourge of nettles, red and black, on white
(Argent, a scourge sable lashed with nettles gules)

House_Volmark.name: House Volmark
House_Volmark.coat of arms: A black leviathan on a grey field (Cendr e, a leviathan sable)
title: Lord of Volmark
Lord of Greenshield

House_Wynch.name: House Wynch
coat of arms: A bloody moon on purple
(Purpure, a moon proper tipped sanguine)
House_Wynch.title: Lord of Iron Holt[1]

House_Codd.name: House Codd
House_Codd.words: Though All Men Do Despise Us

House_Farwynd_of_the_Lonely_Light.name: House Farwynd of the Lonely Light
coat of arms: Per fesse: below a black sea with crested line, a black longship, outlined against the setting sun, dark red on orange
(Per fess wavy crested tenn  and sable, in chief on a demi-guze per fess issuant from the division a longship sailing upon the division of the second)
House_Farwynd_of_the_Lonely_Light.title: Lord of the Lonely Light[1]

House_Goodbrother_of_Crow_Spike_Keep.name: House Goodbrother of Crow Spike Keep

House_Harlaw_of_Grey_Garden.name: House Harlaw of Grey Garden
coat of arms: Quarterly, a silver scythe on black, a peacock on cream
(Quarterly, first and fourth sable, a scythe argent, second and third carnation, a peacock in his pride proper)
title: Knight of Grey Garden
Lord of Greyshield

House_Harlaw_of_Harridan_Hill.name: House Harlaw of Harridan Hill
coat of arms: A silver scythe on a pale blue field
(Bleu celeste, a scythe argent)
House_Harlaw_of_Harridan_Hill.title: Master of Harridan Hill[1][2]

House_Harlaw_of_Harlaw_Hall.name: House Harlaw of Harlaw Hall
coat of arms: Per bend black and silver, two scythes counterchanged
(Per bend sable and argent, two scythes counterchanged)
House_Harlaw_of_Harlaw_Hall.title: Master of Harlaw Hall[1][2]

House_Harlaw_of_the_Tower_of_Glimmering.name: House Harlaw of the Tower of Glimmering
coat of arms: A silver scythe on black within an embattled silver border
(Sable, a scythe within a bordure embattled argent)

House_Greyiron.name: House Greyiron
coat of arms: The sea king's head, white with dark green seaweed beard and hair, a black crown on a grey field
(Cendr e, the sea king’s head argent bearded and crined with seaweed vert crowned sable)
title: High King of the Iron Islands
King of the Iron Islands

House_Hoare.name: House Hoare
coat of arms: Per saltire, two heavy silver chains crossing between a gold longship on a black field, a dark green pine on a white field, a cluster of red grapes on a gold field, and a black raven flying in a blue sky

(Per saltire sable, azure, argent and or, two chains throughout saltirewise argent between in chief a longship or, in dexter a raven volant sable, in sinister a pine-tree vert and in base a bunch of grapes gules)
title: King of the Iron Islands
King of the Isles and the Rivers
